attributes.action: Put an immediate end to the payment of benefits to people in polygamous 'marriages'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Apparently men who come to the UK from from other cultures who have more than one 'wife', are able to claim extra benefits, despite bigamy being illegal in the UK. I think it is wrong to give financial support to something that is against our laws, and which the vast majority find abhorrent and immoral.
If people wish to live in our country, it must be according to our laws, and they should not expect to obtain additional public benefits to subsidise their unacceptable way of life.
